subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After stunning the racing community by announcing his switch to Nascar from Formula One in July, Juan Pablo Montoya quickly made the field for the season-ending Ford 400 on Sunday.
snippet: After stunning the racing community by announcing his switch to Nascar from Formula One in July, Juan Pablo Montoya quickly made the field for the season-ending Ford 400 on Sunday.
